Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Prima Series Freestanding Gas Range with 5 Sealed Burners, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity, Temperature Gauge in Stainless Steel (Prima / Range / Stainless Steel) - VPRFSGG365SS
Variant HTML:
The Verona VPRFSGG365SS 36-Inch Prima Collection Gas Range is a beautiful addition to any kitchen. It has a sleek design with an angled stainless steel handle and analogue temperature gauge. The cooktop has 5 sealed SABAF burners that produce 57,000 BTU of heat. The oven has a convection fan that distributes heat evenly throughout the 5 cu. ft. interior.

Dishwasher Features:

  • 5 Refrigerated SABAF Burners
  • total of 57,000 BTU
  • A pair of rings with 5,000 to 12,000 BTU output
  • Two-Segment Semi-Rapid 1,500-7,500 BTU
  • Single-Burner Setup with Two Crowns, 1,100–17,000 BTU, 1,100–2,800 BTU, and 5,000–14,200 BTU;
  • Instant Safety Shut-Off Thermocouple Ignition with One Touch
  • Seamless Cast Iron Grates
  • Cast-Iron Wok Support Ring Inclusive


Kitchen Appliances:

  • A 5.0 cu. ft. (30"W x 16"D x 15.5"H) cube
  • Powerful Oven with 21,000 BTU
  • Full-Width Broil Element, Door Closed
  • Broiler Power of 5,000W
  • Features: Fry, Broil, Defrost, and Convection Bake
  • 3-Pane Detachable Glass Oven Door with Soft Close Technology
  • Two Lighted LED Oven Spoons
  • Durable enamel interior for ovens
  • 2 - Adjustable standard racks
  • one - assembly of the broiler pan


Extra Functions:

  • A Professional-Grade Temperature Gauge and Knob
  • Chrome-Platted Aluminum Handle
  • Drawer with Full Width for Storage
  • Concealed Oven Door Closure
  • Comes with an LP Conversion Kit
  • 100 watts, 60 hertz, 120 volts
  • Included in the warranty are two years of parts and labor.


Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Drawer with Full Width for Storage
    • Allows you to keep your kitchen organized and free of clutter by providing a place to store cookware.
  • Five stovetop ovens
    • Featuring five sealed burners, you can control the heat precisely and use it for a variety of cooking methods.
  • Oven Capacity: 5.0 cu. ft.
    • You can bake, roast, or broil large meals in the roomy oven.
  • Iron Grates that are Continuous
    • Stability and uniform heat distribution are guaranteed by the heavy-duty grates.
  • Pro Knob Design and Temperature Gauge
    • The ergonomically designed knobs provide a sleek appearance and provide effortless operation, while the precise temperature monitoring allows for precise cooking control.
